2024.title: AI-powered Frontend
2024.description: Integrating on-device and server-side AI to enhance UX: code generation, layout suggestions, and accessibility improvements.

2024.title: Serverless Edge Functions
2024.description: Deploying lightweight serverless functions at edge locations for personalization and low-latency compute.

2024.title: Typed CSS (CSS Modules / CSS-in-TypeScript)
2024.description: Stronger typing for styles to catch errors at compile-time and enable better editor tooling.

2024.title: Privacy-preserving Analytics
2024.description: Analytics approaches that avoid cross-site trackers, leveraging aggregated or differential-privacy techniques.

2024.title: Micro-frontend Architectures
2024.description: Composing independently deployable frontend modules to scale teams and codebases while preserving UX cohesion.

2024.title: Next.js 14
2024.description: Next.js 14 is a React framework that enables hybrid static & server rendering, TypeScript support, smart bundling, and route pre-fetching. The 2024 release focused on improving AI integration, server actions, and streaming, making it even faster for building modern web applications.

2024.title: Bun 1.0
2024.description: Bun is a blazing fast JavaScript runtime, bundler, transpiler, and package manager. In 2024, Bun 1.0 gained rapid popularity for its speed improvements over Node.js and Deno, offering native TypeScript and npm compatibility out of the box.

2024.title: Astro
2024.description: Astro is a modern front-end framework for building websites with less JavaScript by default. In 2024, Astro 3 brought powerful integration for serverless deployments and partial hydration, letting developers build faster, content-heavy sites with best-in-class performance.

2024.title: Qwik
2024.description: Qwik is a new kind of web framework focusing on instant loading, even for complex sites. Qwik 1.2, released in 2024, introduced better integration with edge computing and optimized resumability for dynamic web apps.

2024.title: Svelte 5 (Rethink)
2024.description: Svelte is a radical new approach to building UIs. Svelte 5, known as 'Rethink', released in 2024, introduced a new reactive model, making state management and component composition more intuitive while producing extremely small bundles.

2024.title: React Server Components
2024.description: React Server Components allow developers to build fast, scalable apps by rendering components on the server, sending minimal data to the client. In 2024, support for server actions and loading patterns made RSC production-ready in the React 19 ecosystem.

2024.title: HTMX
2024.description: HTMX enables access to AJAX, CSS Transitions, WebSockets, and Server Sent Events directly in HTML. In 2024, adoption soared as it allowed developers to build highly interactive sites without heavy JavaScript frameworks.

2024.title: AI-Enhanced Code Completion (Copilot X)
2024.description: GitHub Copilot X, released to general use in 2024, revolutionized code editing by using GPT-4-based LLMs for pair programming, chat, and code completion across IDEs. It greatly boosted productivity with AI-powered suggestions.

2024.title: Clerk.dev
2024.description: Clerk provides complete user management and authentication tools for modern web apps. In 2024, it was commended for its UI components, end-to-end security, and seamless integration with frameworks like Next.js, Remix, and Astro.

2024.title: DBRX
2024.description: DBRX is an open-source foundation LLM model specialized for database-aware applications and AI-driven data queries, rapidly adopted by SaaS startups in 2024 for integrating AI-powered analytics into their sites.
